description: The crowd is cheering as Mitch "The Machine" Vaughn alongside Doug "The Destroyer" Acre walk onto the mat, going up against Eli "The Hammer" Hunter & Tatum "The Beast". Hammer and Destroyer have a bit of unfinished business since their last two fights where Destroyer came out on top, so Hammer is hoping The Beast will help him in his quest for vengeance. The sound of the roaring crowd fills the arena as our fighters fight three grueling rounds to see which team comes out on top. Once the points are tallied, the losers endure torment and humiliation while the winners fuck their way to a victorious orgasm, leaving their opponents covered in cum.
title: Beast & Hammer vs Machine & Destroyer - Live Tag Team Match
